name: vscodeI18nLinter
description: A VSCode extension to identify and extract string literals for js(x)/ts(x) files

vscodeI18nLinter.stringLiteralRegex.description: The regular expression to identify string literals to be translated to I18N symbol

vscodeI18nLinter.markStringLiterals.description: Mark string literals in editor so you can quickly spot on them

vscodeI18nLinter.enableReplaceSuggestion.description: Add a light blob beside string literal and provide I18N variable replacement suggestions

vscodeI18nLinter.i18nFilesPattern.description: A glob expression (eg. abc/**/*.ts) to match I18N translation files

commands.title: Replace Common String Literals to I18N variables
